items.name: SP#1 SIZZLING FAJITAS
items.description: Tender grilled beef or chicken with sautéed onions and bell peppers.

items.name: SP#2 FAJITA SALAD
items.description: Fresh salad topped with your choice of grilled fajita meat.

items.name: SP#3 CHIMICHANGA CHICKEN
items.description: Deep-fried burrito filled with chicken, beans, and cheese.

items.name: SP#4 TACO SALAD
items.description: Crispy tortilla bowl filled with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and your choice of meat.

items.name: SP#5 ENCHILADAS VERDES
items.description: Corn tortillas filled with cheese and topped with green salsa and sour cream.

items.name: SP#6 SPEEDY GONZALEZ
items.description: One taco, one enchilada, and choice of rice or beans.

items.name: SP#7 AUTHENTIC STREET TACOS
items.description: Three street-style tacos with onions, cilantro, and lime.

items.name: SP#8 GRANDE QUESADILLA
items.description: Large flour tortilla filled with cheese and your choice of meat.

items.name: SP#9 MEXICAN COMBO
items.description: One enchilada, one taco, and one chalupa with rice and beans.

items.name: SP#10 CARNITAS PLATE
items.description: Slow-cooked pork served with rice, beans, and tortillas.

items.name: SP#11 CHILE RELLENO
items.description: Poblano pepper stuffed with cheese, battered and fried to perfection.

items.name: SP#12 FAJITA TACO
items.description: Two tacos with grilled fajita meat, onions, and bell peppers.

items.name: SP#13 HALF ROY SPECIAL
items.description: Our chef's special combination plate with a variety of favorites.

items.name: SP#14 NACHOS SUPREME
items.description: Loaded nachos with beef, chicken, beans, cheese, lettuce, and tomatoes.

items.name: SP#15 BURRITO SUPREME
items.description: Large burrito filled with meat, beans, lettuce, sour cream, and cheese.

items.name: SP#16 HOT AND SPICY BURRITO
items.description: Spicy burrito with jalapeños, hot sauce, and your choice of meat.

items.name: SP#17 CHICKEN FINGERS
items.description: Crispy chicken tenders served with fries and dipping sauce.

items.name: SP#18 TAMPICO PLATE
items.description: Grilled chicken breast topped with sautéed vegetables and cheese.

items.name: SP#19 HUEVOS RANCHEROS
items.description: Fried eggs topped with ranchero sauce, served with rice and beans.

items.name: SP#20 FISH TACOS
items.description: Three tacos with grilled or fried fish, cabbage, and special sauce.
